hero.title: Privacy made simple
hero.subtitle: Enjoy secure browsing, streaming, and messaging with our unmatched blend of decentralized VPN, mixnet, and zero-knowledge payments.
hero.preCta: Sign up now for instant free beta credentials.

featuresGrid.title: 5-hop novel Nym mixnet
featuresGrid.text: Elevated privacy with advanced onion encryption, data splitting, mixing, and concealment in cover traffic.

featuresGrid.title: 2-hop secure WireGuard decentralized VPN
featuresGrid.text: Swift two-hop decentralized mode with onion encryption but no cover traffic.

featuresGrid.title: Unlinkable online activity
featuresGrid.text: Inability to correlate IPs with network requests, by design. No backdoor or covert access to traffic and private data.

featuresGrid.title: Advanced privacy in one app
featuresGrid.text: Unmatched privacy within a single application thanks to the unique blend of mixnet and decentralized VPN.

featuresGrid.title: Privacy-enhancing payments
featuresGrid.text: Zero-knowledge payment method, ensuring privacy and concealing user identity for transactions.

fullWidthBanner.title: Advanced privacy. In your hands.
text: Tailor your privacy options to suit your requirements. Opt for the fast decentralized VPN or prioritize higher privacy with the mixnet, all within a single app, while benefitting from the high redundancy of the decentralized Nym network and unlinkability of your data.

centeredBanner.title: Robust security for all your devices
text: Protect against eavesdroppers and corporate / government surveillance. Prevent data leaks with our upcoming built-in kill switch, available across all your devices with just one account.

comparationTable.title: Digital integrity guaranteed
comparationTable.subtitle: See how NymVPN compares with the alternatives

rows.title: Independent multi-hop routing
rows.description: Traffic routed via at least 2 independent server hops

rows.title: Unlinkable online activity
rows.description: Impossible to correlate traffic with end users

rows.title: Privacy-preserving payments
rows.description: User identity concealment during VPN service subscription

rows.title: Traffic analysis resistance
rows.description: Packet shuffling and encryption to protect your data and metadata

rows.title: High quality of service
rows.description: Incentivization of server operators for a high quality of service

rows.title: Open source
rows.description: Software development with publicly accessible source code

mailCollectionBanner.title: Join the NymVPN beta phase
text: Sign up now and instantly receive your free access credentials. Join the community on [Discord](https://nymtech.net/go/discord) or [Matrix](https://matrix.to/#/#NymVPN:nymtech.chat).

inNumbers.subtitle: Privacy-mixing nodes
inNumbers.text: Experience unparalleled protection ‚Äì hundreds of independently-run nodes randomly chosen at every epoch

inNumbers.subtitle: Exit servers
inNumbers.text: Enjoy a resilient, high-quality set of exit gateways and network requesters

inNumbers.subtitle: Countries
inNumbers.text: Access our extensive global network spanning Africa, Americas, Asia, Europe and Oceania

socialReviews.title: Don't just take our word for it
socialReviews.subtitle: Featured in leading publications and trusted by privacy advocates.

reviews.author: Chelsea Manning
reviews.text: As technology evolves, so do the challenges to our privacy. NymVPN isn't just a response to these challenges; it's a proactive privacy and censorship resistance solution designed to stay ahead of the curve in protecting user data in an increasingly tense and uncertain world.
